episode_event_ch0020_ch0004_ch0089/4001_:
Hilbert and his friends formed new sync
pairs with Pokémon on Pasio...
Looking at them together like this...

The three of them really look alike, don’t
they. I wonder if they have some kind of
connection.

It’s said that when Tornadus and Thundurus
fight, Landorus quells their conflict.

Apparently, it can create energy from the
forces of their wind and lightning to give
nutrients to the soil.

That sure puts the battle between these
Pokémon to good use, huh!

Creating harmony from clashing energies...
Of the three of them, I wonder if Landorus
functions as a sort of mediator.
That’s a very N-like way of putting it!
There are other Thundurus on Pasio...

If they all started fighting at the same time,
that’d probably be pretty tough for Landorus,
wouldn’t it.

I suppose we should get stronger just in case
that happens, Landorus.

Oh, if that’s how it is, you know we’re not
gonna lose! I’ll prove my Tornadus is the
strongest!

Let’s start training right now! Hilbert,
be my opponent, would ya?
Oh yeah! We’ll take that challenge!

I feel the same way, y’know! My Thundurus
is the best!

Hahaha... Looks like we’ll need the skills
of a mediator pretty soon!
